Translations.Text: Inna: "i ma bbwi$ awen d nnhaya yifen tin id tufam ar imezwura nnwen"? Nnan: "nekwni, ihi, nugwi ayen is id teppuceggaam
Nerra d ppao, segsen. Muqel amek tevoa d inekkaoen
Mi inna Iboahim i baba s, akked ugdud is: "nek, ur pkka$ deg wayen la taabdem
kkes ed Win iyi d Ixelqen. D Neppa, s tidep, ara iyi Inhun
Irra t d awal imezgi i texlift is, amar a d u$alen s abrid
U £ate$ ten, nitni akked imezwura nnsen, armi ten id tusa tidep, akked umazan ipbegginen
Mi ten id tusa tidep, nnan: "wagi d sseur, ihi, nekwni nugi t
Nnan: "A lemmer id ssadren Leqwoan agi ar urgaz ameqwoaean n snat temdinin

Day d nitni i ifeooqen aeunu n Mass ik? D Nekwni i sen Ifeooqen tamaict nnsen, di tmeddurt n ddunit, u Nessuli kra segsen, tidekkaoin sennig wiyav, iwakken kra, ad sxedmen wiyav. Aeunu n Mass ik yif ayen jemaan
Lemmer macci yiwen n lois kan ara yilin imdanen, a Nerr tiseddura n lfeiia i ixxamen n wid inekoen Aenin, akw i tiseddaoin i$ef ara alin
i ixxamen nnsen, tibbura; imieoeen ideg ara elen
akked uzewweq. Maca, ayagi akw, d astumen i tmeddurt n ddunit. Laxeot, ar Mass ik, i wid ipeezziben
Win iooan asmekti n Uenin, ad as Nqelled Cciian, ad as yili d amsaaef
Ih, Nitni veooifen ten seg ubrid, u $ilen ar nitni pwanhan
Alamma ma iusa d $uone£, inna d: "ah, awufan gari yidek, amecwao illan ger ugmuv d wayev". A yir amsaaef
Ur kwen infaa, assa, d awez$i, ma tdensem. Aql akwen tcerkem aaaqeb
Day a pperrev, kecc, aaeeeug ad issel, ne$ a ppenhuv ader$al, akked win illan di ttelfan n uuee
Amar a k id Nekkes, d$a a d Nerr ppao segsen
ne$ ak Nessken ayen i sen d Nhegga. £uone£, ih, adabu fellasen
Iief deg wayen i k d ippuweeean. Kecc, war ccekk, aql ak deg ubrid uwqim
Wagi, ih, d asmekti i kecc, akked ugdud ik; deqqal fellawen asteqsi
Steqsi wid id Nuzen, uqbel ik, seg imazanen nne£. Day Nerra, war Aenin, ioebbiten ara aabden
Ni$ Nuzen ed Musa s issekniyen nne£, ar Feraun akked imvebboen is. Inna: "nek d amazan n Mass imavalen
Mi sen d ibbwi issekniyen nne£, nitni la ppavsan degsen
Ur asen Nessenaata assekni, siwa ma i$leb gma s. Nesaadda fellasen aaaqeb, amar a d u$alen s abrid
Nnan: "a yaseeear, naao a$ Mass ik, s lemaahda i k Ifka. Nekwni ara nepwanhu
Mi Nessafer aaaqeb fellasen, imiren ad xedaan
Imdee Feraun i ugdud is, inna: "a yagdud iw, day macci inu tagelda n Maseo, akked isaffen agi, i ippazalen seddaw i. Day ur twalam ara
Ne$ nek ur ife$ ara imdelli agi, ur nezmir ad ibeggen
Acimi ur as qqnen ara imeqyasen n uwoe$, ne$ ur d usint ara yides lmalayek, pwazdan t
Issefqaa agdud is. Unzen as. Wigi, ih, d agdud ucmit
Mi £ zzaafen, Nerra d ppao segsen, Ne$meq iten meooa
Nerra ten d asmekti u d amedya, i ineggura
